register.reg_long_name: System Performance Monitors Event Type Register

purpose_text.para: With SPMEVFILTR<n>_EL0 and SPMEVFILT2R<n>_EL0, configures when event counter SPMEVCNTR<n>_EL0 in System PMU <s> increments.
The contents of this register are IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED. An Event Type Select Register typically contains:

listitem.content: A field defining the event that the counter is responsive to, in the least-significant bits.
Controls for per-counter filtering, such as by mode or state.
Additional controls, such as for a per-counter state machine.

reg_groups.reg_group: A group mapping that does not have a known primary

access_permission_text.para: To access SPMEVTYPER<n>_EL0 for System PMU <s>, set SPMSELR_EL0.SYSPMUSEL to s and SPMSELR_EL0.BANK to n[5:4].
SPMEVTYPER<n>_EL0 reads-as-zero and ignores writes if any of the following are true:

listitem.content: Event counter <n> is not implemented by System PMU <s>.

ps.name: MRS
MSRregister
